Notes: A falling ice crystal that creates an ice platform when it lands. Touching the meteor will freeze and damage the player. The ice platform can be stood on. The platform will disappear after three seconds and the crystal will reappear again later on.

Obj_arg0.Name: First Appearance Delay
Obj_arg0.Description: The delay in frames before the actual meteor appears. Default is 0.

Obj_arg1.Name: Pause Delay
Obj_arg1.Description: How long the object will remain invisible until it appears again. Default is 0.

Obj_arg3.Name: Falling Time
Obj_arg3.Description: How long it takes for the meteor to fall down. Minimmum should be 15. Default is 180.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
